comments.body: If the default is `None`, this should be `Optional[Dict[str, str]]`.

This is not required. mypy is smart enought and it can guess. Without this, the code looks clearer. There is also no repeated information.
Reference: https://mypy.readthedocs.io/en/stable/command_line.html#none-and-optional-handling

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +73,77 @@            self,
            bash_command: str,
            env: Dict[str, str] = None,
            output_encoding: str = 'utf-8',
            *args, **kwargs) -> None:

comments.body:
I also updated this condition 

> Explicit is better than implicit.
https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0020/
I added a sentence, because the reason may not be understandable for every person.

                raise AirflowException('Bash command failed. The command returned a non-zero exit code.')

comments.body: I changed the logging method, because data should be passed in arguments, because then it look better in the console - different a color.

            sub_process.wait()
